purpose: Facilitate the development and deployment of geo-distributed edge AI applications with stateful serverless architecture.
principle: Leverages QUIC protocol for low-latency communication and WebAssembly for cross-platform execution, enabling function calls across distributed systems.
reusability: Designed to be platform-agnostic with support for various edge computing environments; offers APIs for integration with different models and systems.
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, which may imply limited stability and feature set; specific to edge computing scenarios.
name: yomo

highlight: Stateful serverless framework optimized for low-latency, geo-distributed edge AI applications.
